nodes.text: A garrison was associated with a Trandoshan clan, of which Pekt was a member. The garrison was used to contain Wookiee prisoners-of-war, which had been captured as part of the longstanding rivalry between the two species. As Pekt entered his molt stage of development he moved on from experimenting on his families' servants, to using the Wookiees kept in the garrison as subjects. Pekt realized that Wookiees would make excellent slaves if they could be tamed, causing him to develop a series of restraints and techniques with which to hold them.
Pekt's clan's garrison was mentioned in Pekt's DataBank entry in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
